data.enText: something that you need or want
a software package to meet your requirements
Our immediate requirement is extra staff.

data.chText: 这些货物超过了我们的需要。
data.enText: These goods are surplus to requirements (= more than we need) .
something that you must have in order to do sth else

data.chText: 符合 / 满足必备的条件
这个学程的基本入学条件是什么？
data.enText: What is the minimum entrance requirement for this course?

tr: something that is required in advance
example: Latin was a prerequisite for admission
the requirements of his work affected his health
there were many demands on his time
food and shelter are necessities of life
the essentials of the good life
allow farmers to buy their requirements under favorable conditions
a place where the requisites of water fuel and fodder can be obtained

value.def: A requirement is a quality or qualification that you must have in order to be allowed to do something or to be suitable for something.

example.ex: Its products met all legal requirements...
example.tran: 它的产品符合所有的法律要求。

example.ex: Graduate status is the minimum requirement for entry to the teaching profession...
example.tran: 研究生学历是从事教学工作的最低要求。

example.ex: I knew that concentration was the first requirement for learning.
example.tran: 我知道专心致志是学习的首要条件。

value.def: Your requirements are the things that you need.

example.ex: Variations of this programme can be arranged to suit your requirements.
example.tran: 本方案可以进行调整，以满足您的需求。

example.ex: ...a packaged food which provides 100 percent of your daily requirement of one vitamin.
example.tran: 能够百分之百满足人体对于一种维生素每日所需的包装食品
